title: 148: Public Speaking To Be Remembered with Alexi Panos
itunes:title: 148: Public Speaking To Be Remembered with Alexi Panos
description:
Want to know what it takes to be a great speaker? Alexi is your girl. She and husband Preston Smiles (and now baby Kingston Ra) travel around the world speaking and empowering crowds to become their best selves. In this episode we discuss her journey from Ja Rule’s back-up dancer (for real) to TV host to prominent speaker to mother, and why she has decided her keep her motherhood journey private.

Connect with Alexi at @alexipanos alexipanos.com

Get 35% off your order of Youveda supplements at youveda.com with code “sahara”
